code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{FaSearch}from"react-icons/fa";import"./SearchBar.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const SearchBar=_ref=>{let{searchProducts,setResults}=_ref;const[input,setInput]=useState("");const fetchData=value=>{console.log("search term is: "+value);const{data}=searchProducts(value);console.log("data from search: "+data);setResults=data;};const handleSearchChange=value=>{setInput(value);fetchData(value);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input-wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaSearch,{id:"search-icon"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Type to search",value:input,onChange:e=>handleSearchChange(e.target.value)})]});};
